title: My pixel 3 XL crushes when unplugged from charger as well as the plugged earphones stoped working
content:
Whenever I take the phone out from the original charger, it crushes/shuts down and I have to press a long time on the power button for it to turn on again. 
The original plugged earphones as well as any other earphones plugged with the adaptor, do not work. I can only use Bluetooth earphones.
